channel.title: Legion-X - Court system. 135 is max level, New bosses, Clans, 700+ DL's
channel.description:
Welcome to my release of Legion-X. This server is named legion-X because i was tired of using the same name i always do , eclipse-rsps. I have made significant changes to eclipse-rsps pvp based that i think most of you will enjoy. :D Some of the pictures were too big to crop, sorry :(
~enjoy~ [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/4.jpg[/img] item.title: Legion-X - Court system. 135 is max level, New bosses, Clans, 700+ DL's
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Mario PvP, post:30, topic:438022”]It looks pretty good, but you shouldn’t load higher revision items then 317 itself.
Now-a-days there are only 317 loading higher revision items. I think if you change it to 317 or 317/377 people will even like this more[/quote]I made this like a year ago, why are you people commenting on it?

Read full topic

item.title: Legion-X - Court system. 135 is max level, New bosses, Clans, 700+ DL's
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“kenno, post:22, topic:438022”]Have you heard of, LEECH!@!@! My work. i released this on other commuinty, My server name has been Legion-X before and my username in the server is Legion, Stop Copying please.

I dont have proof of the work i have done but, i got witnesses xD

-Legion[/quote]
the only reason i nammed this Legion-X is because i played a server that i loved about 3 years ago named legion-x but it died… so i nammed this legion-x, so dont think ur big, cuz i didnt copy you… and how is this your work? by accidently using a name you use, means that what i’ve codded/programmed is your work? i dont think so

Read full topic

Not bad, keep up the good work and ^ this isn’t rune-server were people always say, nice release wont be using it lol.

I see it all the time on these Forums. So i use what i want. I don’t even us that r-s besides for posting my server online there. That’s about it.
[/quote]why do you have to be such a troll? i think this is a super release

When did he say he disliked it…?[/quote]
who?
